title: Gifted SHACO vanishes from my champ list!! :( :(
body:
I wanted shaco so bad, and a very kind guy helped me out and gifted me SHACO 3 months ago. After I received SHACO I played him for a while and I was inactive because of school. And yesterday when I started a game and searched for SHACO he was gone like the wind(Kasaki). :( :(

Summoner name: Samar Shrestha
Server: NA

{{champion:35}} 

I apreciate any help by you guys, Thank YOu..

**PLZ HELP!!! :(

replies.body:
Hiya! 

There are a couple reasons Shaco may have been removed from your account - 

1) If a player participates in Refer-A-Friend fraud to acquire IP or RP, then any champions/skins gifted with this IP or RP are removed.

2) If a player purchases RP and gifts content with it, and subsequently issues a chargeback for the money spent on that RP, we will remove that content.

If you don't think these reasons are why Shaco is missing, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584) so we can take a look at your account (with a pink ward, of course) and see where Shaco may be hiding!

It may be that but i dont think he wanted to take it back. And now a days i am having a lot of packet loss problem even if my ping is low. Is it because of my internet problem or riot's. It doesnot let me play league. PLZ HELP.. And thankx for the reply, I appreciate that.

It may not be he wanted to take it back, but a card he used to purchase RP may have issued a chargeback. If the money for the RP is refunded, it means the content is no longer paid for, so it it's then removed from the player's account. 

As for the tech issues you're having, that's a bit out of my area of expertise. I'd [ask Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=34190). They have some good troubleshooting methods that can help narrow down why you're having these issues.
oo I get it now. Thank You.. :){{champion:35}}

You forgot something.

3) check behind you
You know, look behind you, as in horror movies.
{{champion:35}} now you see me, now you don't!
